Open Wallpaper Loader.
root.enabled.description:

Open Wallpaper Loader.

root.auto-refresh.title:
重启后自动更换壁纸
Auto Refrsh wallpaper after editor reloaded.
root.auto-refresh.description:
(*) 重启后自动更换壁纸。
Auto Refrsh wallpaper after editor reloaded.

profile.use-remove.title:
移除壁纸后直接删除壁纸文件
Delete the wallpaper file directly after removing the wallpaper.
profile.use-remove.description:
移除壁纸后直接删除壁纸文件。
Delete the wallpaper file directly after removing the wallpaper.

style.opacity.title:
工作区透明度
Workspace Opacity
style.opacity.description:
工作区透明度[0-1]。太低会看不清代码，太高会看不清壁纸。
Workspace Opacity [0-1]. If it is too low, you will not be able to see the code clearly; if it is too high, you will not be able to see the wallpaper clearly.

style.animation.use-zoom-animation.title:
开启壁纸动态缩放
Enable wallpaper dynamic scaling
style.animation.use-zoom-animation.description:
(*) 使用壁纸动态缩放。启用后壁纸会循环放大-缩小。
Use wallpapers to dynamically zoom. When enabled, the wallpaper will cycle between zooming in and out.

style.animation.zoom-cycle.title:
动态缩放周期
Dynamic scaling cycle
style.animation.zoom-cycle.description:
壁纸动态缩放的循环周期。（单位：秒）
Wallpaper dynamic scaling cycle. (Unit: seconds)

style.animation.zoom-scale.title:
壁纸缩放比例
Wallpaper scaling
style.animation.zoom-scale.description:
壁纸缩放比例。默认是100，可以大于或者低于100，建议50-150之间。
Wallpaper scaling. The default is 100, which can be greater or less than 100. It is recommended to be between 50-150.

style.animation.use-switch-animation.title:
开启壁纸自动切换
Turn on auto wallpaper switching
style.animation.use-switch-animation.description:
(*) 定时刷新模式。开启后，壁纸定期会自动切换。慎重考虑下开启后会不会影响到你的工作效率。
Scheduled refresh mode. When turned on, the wallpaper will auto switch periodically. Carefully consider whether turning it on will affect your work efficiency.

style.animation.switch-cycle.title:
壁纸自动切换周期
Wallpaper auto switching cycle
style.animation.switch-cycle.description:
每隔多少(单位:秒)切换一次壁纸，建议不要太小，会刷新得非常频繁。
How often (unit: seconds) to switch the wallpaper, it is recommended not to be too small, as it will be refreshed very frequently.
